SELECT DISTINCT A.BLDRGST_PK , AS ROAD_ADDR ,A.SGG_CD || A.BJD_CD || DECODE(NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0'),'0','1','1','2') || LPAD(A.BUN,4,'0') || LPAD(A.JI,4,'0') AS PNU ,A.BLD_NM ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD = '1' THEN NULL ELSE C.DONG_NM END DONG_NM ,A.REGSTR_GB_CD ,A.REGSTR_GB_NM ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN B.USEAPR_DAY ELSE C.USEAPR_DAY END USEAPR_DAY ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN B.TOTAREA ELSE C.TOTAREA END TOTAREA ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN B.MAIN_PURPS_CD ELSE C.MAIN_PURPS_CD END MAIN_PURPS_CD ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN B.MAIN_PURPS_NM ELSE C.MAIN_PURPS_NM END MAIN_PURPS_NM ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN NULL ELSE C.MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD END MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,CASE WHEN A.REGSTR_KIND_CD='1' THEN NULL ELSE C.MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM END MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,A.REGSTR_KIND_CD ,A.REGSTR_KIND_NM FROM DJRBLDRGST A LEFT JOIN DJRRECAPTITLE B ON (A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK) LEFT JOIN DJRTITLE C ON (A.BLDRGST_PK = C.BLDRGST_PK) WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk} AND NOT A.REGSTR_KIND_CD = '4' ORDER BY PNU, REGSTR_KIND_CD, DONG_NM

SELECT DISTINCT A.BLDRGST_PK , AS ROAD_ADDR ,A.SGG_CD || A.BJD_CD || DECODE(NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0'),'0','1','1','2') || LPAD(A.BUN,4,'0') || LPAD(A.JI,4,'0') AS PNU ,A.UPPER_BLDRGST_PK ,A.BLD_NM ,A.SGG_CD ,A.BJD_CD ,NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0') AS REPR_GB_CD ,A.BUN ,A.JI ,A.SPLOT_NM ,A.BLOCK ,A.LOT ,A.BYLOT_CNT ,A.RGN_CD ,A.JIGU_CD ,A.ZONE_CD ,A.RGN_NM ,A.JIGU_NM ,A.ZONE_NM ,B.DONG_NM ,B.MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,B.MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,B.PLAT_AREA ,B.ARCH_AREA ,B.BC_RAT ,B.TOTAREA ,B.VL_RAT_ESTM_TOTAREA ,B.VL_RAT ,B.STRCT_CD ,B.STRCT_NM ,B.ETC_STRCT ,B.MAIN_PURPS_CD ,B.MAIN_PURPS_NM ,B.ETC_PURPS ,B.ROOF_CD ,B.ROOF_NM ,B.ETC_ROOF ,B.HHLD_CNT ,B.FMLY_CNT ,B.HEIT ,B.GRND_FLR_CNT ,B.UGRND_FLR_CNT ,B.RIDE_USE_ELVT_CNT ,B.EMGEN_USE_ELVT_CNT ,B.ATCH_BLD_CNT ,B.ATCH_BLD_AREA ,B.TOT_DONG_TOTAREA ,B.INDR_MECH_UTCNT ,B.INDR_MECH_AREA ,B.OUDR_MECH_UTCNT ,B.OUDR_MECH_AREA ,B.INDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,B.INDR_AUTO_AREA ,B.OUDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,B.OUDR_AUTO_AREA ,B.PMSNO_YMD ,B.STCNS_DAY ,B.USEAPR_DAY ,B.HO_CNT ,B.ENGY_EFF_GRADE ,B.ENGY_RDC_RATE ,B.ENGY_EPI_SCORE ,B.ENV_BLDG_GRADE ,B.ENV_BLDG_SOCRE ,B.INTL_BLDG_GRADE ,B.INTL_BLDG_SOCRE ,B.ERS_YN ,B.ERS_CAPA ,CASE WHEN B.PMSNO_YEAR IS NOT NULL THEN B.PMSNO_YEAR||'-'||B.PMSNO_KIK_NM||'-'||PMSNO_GB_NM ELSE NULL END AS PMSRGST_INFO FROM DJRBLDRGST A INNER JOIN DJRTITLE B ON A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT A.BLDRGST_PK ,A.SGG_CD ,A.BJD_CD ,NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0') AS REPR_GB_CD ,A.BUN ,A.JI ,B.DONG_NM ,B.FLR_GB_CD ,B.FLR_GB_NM ,B.FLR_NO ,B.FLR_NO_NM ,B.STRCT_CD ,B.STRCT_NM ,B.ETC_STRCT ,B.MAIN_PURPS_CD ,B.MAIN_PURPS_NM ,B.ETC_PURPS ,B.PAREA ,B.MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,B.MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,B.AREA_EXCT_YN FROM DJRBLDRGST A INNER JOIN DJRFLROULN B on A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk} ORDER BY B.FLR_GB_CD, B.FLR_NO, B.MAIN_PURPS_CD

SELECT DISTINCT A.BLDRGST_PK ,C.BLD_NM ,A.DONG_NM ,A.HO_NM ,A.FLR_GB_CD ,A.FLR_GB_NM ,A.FLR_NO ,A.FLR_GB_NM || ' ' || A.FLR_NO || '층' AS FLR_NM ,B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD ,B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_NM ,B.FLR_NO_NM ,B.STRCT_CD ,B.STRCT_NM ,B.MAIN_PURPS_CD ,B.MAIN_PURPS_NM ,B.ETC_PURPS ,B.PAREA ,(SELECT SUM(PAREA) FROM DJREPOSPUBUSEAREA WHERE BLDRGST_PK = A.BLDRGST_PK AND NOT B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD = '1') AS SHARE_AREA FROM DJREXPOS A, DJREPOSPUBUSEAREA B, DJRBLDRGST C WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK IN ( SELECT BLDRGST_PK FROM DJRBLDRGST WHERE A.SGG_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 1, 5) AND A.BJD_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 6, 5) AND NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0') = DECODE(SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 11, 1), '1', '0', '2', '1') AND A.BUN = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 12, 4) AND A.JI = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 16, 4) AND A.REGSTR_KIND_CD = '4') AND A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK AND B.BLDRGST_PK = C.BLDRGST_PK AND B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD = '1' ORDER BY C.BLD_NM, A.DONG_NM, A.FLR_GB_CD, A.FLR_NO, A.HO_NM

SELECT DISTINCT A.BLDRGST_PK ,C.BLD_NM ,A.DONG_NM ,A.HO_NM ,A.FLR_GB_CD ,A.FLR_GB_NM ,A.FLR_NO ,A.FLR_GB_NM || ' ' || A.FLR_NO || '층' AS FLR_NM ,B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD ,B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_NM ,B.FLR_NO_NM ,B.STRCT_CD ,B.STRCT_NM ,B.MAIN_PURPS_CD ,B.MAIN_PURPS_NM ,B.ETC_PURPS ,B.PAREA ,(SELECT SUM(PAREA) FROM DJREPOSPUBUSEAREA WHERE BLDRGST_PK = A.BLDRGST_PK AND NOT B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD = '1') AS SHARE_AREA FROM DJREXPOS A, DJREPOSPUBUSEAREA B, DJRBLDRGST C WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk} AND A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK AND B.BLDRGST_PK = C.BLDRGST_PK AND B.EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT JIJIGU_GB_CD ,JIJIGU_GB_NM ,JIJIGU_CD ,JIJIGU_NM ,REPR_YN ,ETC_JIJIGU FROM DJRJIJIGU WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT DISTINCT B.BLDRGST_PK ,A.SGG_CD || A.BJD_CD || DECODE(NVL(A.REPR_GB_CD, '0'),'0','1','1','2') || LPAD(A.BUN,4,'0') || LPAD(A.JI,4,'0') AS PNU ,B.OWN_GBN_CD ,B.OWN_GBN_NM ,B.CHANG_CAUS_DAY FROM DJRBLDRGST A INNER JOIN DJROWNR B ON A.BLDRGST_PK = B.BLDRGST_PK WHERE A.BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}
